name: Global Light Theme for League of Legends Boards
description:
A light theme for the new League of Legends boards system. Works for every region.
Replace the default theme with this one to improve readibility.
additional_info:
EUW/EUNE Boards thread: 
http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/boards-feedback-en/FnTw5tTr-guide-light-boards-theme

NA Boards thread:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/EIe66Wup-guide-light-boards-theme

Version 1.2 - 26th of February 2015
- Adding main background image (Gragas)
- Adding background image for OP first post in Discussion view (Anivia)
- Comments "Show more" button tweaking to match with the rest of content loaders across the theme
- Boards left navigation tweaks
- Box tweaks (semi-rounded corners)

Version 1.1 - 25th of February 2015
- Code clean-up and proper compressing for performance improvements
- Fixing notifications modal (from dark color to light shades to match the rest of the style)
- Fixing language selection background color

Version 1.0 - 23rd of February 2015

- Initial release
- Works for every region
